reviews.review_msg: Clare is knowledgeable and caring. HOWEVER, her expectation is way too high. You have to keep working on many things throughout a whole semester. Particularly for the take-home final, an insane amount of writing to be done and she expects you to remember all the class readings. The workload for her class is double than other profs.
Very tough grader, her assignments are super specific and TA's mark incredibly unfairly, taking off large marks for the smallest mistakes

Clare is amazing. She is very knowledgeable and really cares about her students. Separatist movements is a really interesting subject and our major assignment was to engage in a simulation about Scotland seceding from the UK. Highly recommend this course to any poli sci or IR student.

Dr. McGovern is passionate in what she teaches. However, she is a VERY tough grader. You've to to be precise and clear cut in her assignments. I believe that she uses anwers from students to supliment her own research papers.. it's just a doubt I have. Don't expect office hour from her.. very difficult to meet her in person. But she is very nice.

Clare is one of the best professors in the department, she is great at facilitating discussions in class which makes the material more interesting. She will learn everyones name within a week. I have taken multiple classes with her and would highly reccomend her, she is very well respected and I have rarely heard a negative comment about her.
